requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor exploring stock options for the first time.
user_goal: To find information about a specific stock by entering its name or code.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the search bar prominently placed at the top of the page. She wants to look up Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The input field is focused and ready for typing, with placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name'.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah begins typing 'Apple' into the search bar hoping to see suggestions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Auto-suggested results appear below the input in a dropdown menu with a white background and navy borders.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggested Option
narrative_steps.description: Seeing 'Apple Inc. (AAPL)' among the suggestions, Sarah clicks it to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Apple Inc. (AAPL)' from the dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The input field is populated with 'Apple Inc. (AAPL)', and the page updates to show Apple's stock information.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company name, ticker symbol, and current price
user_persona: An experienced trader checking quick facts before making a trade decision.
user_goal: To quickly verify key details of a selected stock without delay.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Stock Details
narrative_steps.description: After searching for Microsoft, Marcus looks for the most essential stock data displayed clearly.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for dynamic update after selecting Microsoft stock.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A card-style container appears below the search bar showing 'Microsoft Corporation (MSFT)' in bold navy font, with the current price aligned to the right.

requirement_tested: Show market trend data with charts or graphs for selected stocks
user_persona: A financial analyst evaluating recent performance trends.
user_goal: To analyze the stock’s performance over time using visual charts.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Market Trends
narrative_steps.description: Elena has selected Tesla and now examines its market trend visualization.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the chart area beneath the basic info section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A full-width line graph shows Tesla's performance over time, with dates on the x-axis and price range on the y-axis, all styled appropriately.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Time Intervals
narrative_steps.description: Curious about short-term changes, Elena decides to switch the view to a 5-day interval.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart reloads and displays Tesla’s stock movement specifically for the last five days.

requirement_tested: Present financial data such as revenue, earnings, and key ratios
user_persona: A portfolio manager assessing investment viability.
user_goal: To review critical financial indicators for informed decision-making.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Financial Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Nathan selects Amazon and scrolls down to inspect its financial health indicators.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down to the tabular financial data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A neatly organized table lists Amazon’s Revenue, EPS, P/E Ratio, Debt-to-Equity, and Dividend Yield with navy-stonned headers.

requirement_tested: Enable users to select from multiple report format options
user_persona: A researcher preparing materials for a presentation.
user_goal: To choose a suitable format for exporting the final stock report.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Export Format
narrative_steps.description: Priya finishes customizing her Google stock report and needs to decide how to save it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'PDF' format button near the bottom of the customization panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'PDF' button becomes visually highlighted, indicating that the report will be generated in PDF format.

requirement_tested: Allow users to customize report content by choosing specific sections or data points
user_persona: A student working on a finance project focusing only on certain aspects.
user_goal: To tailor the report content to include only relevant sections.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Report Sections
narrative_steps.description: James wants a simplified report on Netflix focusing just on basic info and financial data.
narrative_steps.action: Tick the checkboxes for 'Basic Info' and 'Financial Data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only the checked sections will be included in the final generated report.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user selections
user_persona: A business consultant needing regular stock updates for clients.
user_goal: To compile a comprehensive yet customized stock report efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Custom Report
narrative_steps.description: Maria has configured her report preferences for Coca-Cola and is ready to generate it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Report generation starts, the button gets disabled temporarily, and a loading spinner appears during processing.

requirement_tested: Include a report preview feature before final generation
user_persona: A meticulous editor verifying content accuracy pre-export.
user_goal: To preview the report layout and ensure everything looks correct.

narrative_steps.title: Previewing Generated Report
narrative_steps.description: David generates his Disney report and wants to confirm formatting before downloading.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through the embedded report preview pane.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A scrollable iframe displays the formatted report content in real-time, allowing inspection of structure and data.

requirement_tested: Provide export functionality for generated reports in common formats
user_persona: A marketing executive needing shareable documents.
user_goal: To download the finished report in a usable digital format.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Lisa previews her finalized Pfizer report and is satisfied with the result.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download PDF' button underneath the preview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser initiates a download of the report saved as a PDF file without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A UX designer auditing visual consistency across platforms.
user_goal: To evaluate the uniformity of color usage throughout the application.

narrative_steps.title: Validating UI Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Omar navigates through different sections of the site to assess overall aesthetic cohesion.
narrative_steps.action: Observe background and component color schemes across pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All containers and panels maintain a white background, while interactive elements consistently use navy accents for visual harmony.

requirement_tested: Ensure responsive design for desktop and mobile viewing
user_persona: A busy professional accessing the platform on various devices.
user_goal: To seamlessly interact with the website regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Responsive Layout
narrative_steps.description: Chen switches between his laptop and smartphone to compare layouts.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window or switch devices.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content adjusts fluidly, navigation collapses into a hamburger menu on smaller screens, and fonts scale appropriately.

requirement_tested: Include error handling for invalid stock codes or unavailable data
user_persona: A curious teenager experimenting with random inputs.
user_goal: To understand why some searches don't return results.

narrative_steps.title: Encountering Error Handling
narrative_steps.description: Jamie enters a made-up stock code 'XYZ123' expecting feedback.
narrative_steps.action: Submit the invalid stock code in the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An inline alert banner appears above the search bar with a clear error message like 'Invalid stock symbol.', styled red but outlined in navy.

requirement_tested: Provide loading indicators during report generation processes
user_persona: An impatient user expecting immediate responses.
user_goal: To know when a long-running process is underway.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Loading Feedback
narrative_steps.description: Ryan clicks to generate his Boeing report and waits anxiously.
narrative_steps.action: Watch the interface after clicking 'Create My Report'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An animated spinner replaces the main action button, signaling ongoing processing until completion.

requirement_tested: Maintain user session data for report preferences and history
user_persona: A frequent visitor relying on previous settings.
user_goal: To retain personal preferences across visits without reconfiguration.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Session Persistence
narrative_steps.description: Zoe returns to the site after closing her browser earlier.
narrative_steps.action: Refresh the page or reopen the browser and revisit the site.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Previously selected report formats and recently searched stocks remain accessible via session storage mechanisms.
